name: Magic Quest
description: Magic Quest is a tower defense game with towers, mighty enemies, bosses and heroes with unique abilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is a mobile port. It's an ok game, but... If you catch this on sale for a couple of bucks, I might recommend, but otherwise get KR.  1. You max your towers before getting halfway through the game.  2. In the mobile game you have to buy all characters except for your first. Here you unlock them as you go through the maps. 3. When I try to move my character to a certain spot, sometimes he will run another direction trying to get there and never make it. 4. When you upgrade a stat on your characters it does not show that you gained in that stat.   Only about just over halfway through the map, but that is what I see at the moment.
I'm so sorry but I have to say that the game have too much problems. They should have spent more time on it.
